Test.Name: IdentifyNodes
Test.Description: Identifies all nodes on the network using VerifyNodeID

TestObjective.Objective: Send global Verify Node ID Message Network Layer Message
TestObjective.Results: Verified Node ID from all nodes on the network

Test.Name: AliasMapEnquiry
Test.Description: Test the Alias Map Enquiry Message

TestObjective.Objective: Send AME message with Full Node ID of Node Under Test as CAN data payload
TestObjective.Results: Receive Alias Map Definition (AMD) from node matching the Full Node ID sent

TestObjective.Objective: Send AME message with an empty data payload
TestObjective.Results: Alias Map Definitions (AMD) from all nodes on network

TestObjective.Objective: Send AME message with Full Node ID of no known node on the network in the CAN data payload
